item.title: Streamlining Data Fetching in Angular 19 with resource and rxResource
item.description: This articles shows a first look at the new resource and rxResource API, introduced in Angular 19, to work with asynchronous data and deliver as signals.

item.title: How I Conquered the Keychron K2 Pro Challenge at WhatTheStack Conference
item.description: I won an amazing Keychron K2 Pro keyboard at the WhatTheStack conference. Here's the story of how I turned a simple booth challenge into a victory.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: I failed...and I failed a lot
item.description: In this article, I'm sharing about my failures, what they've taught me, and why you shouldn't be afraid to fail
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: Introducing the Batch GitHub Peer Reviewer Chrome Extension for Streamlined Assignment Reviews
item.description: This Chrome extension allows educators and code reviewers to easily provide feedback to multiple GitHub pull requests at once. Approve and submit pull requests with a single click.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: The Complete TypeScript Setup - From Zero to Hero
item.description: Learn how to set up a TypeScript project with the best tools. From npm to ESLint and Jest, this guide offers a step-by-step tutorial for both new and experienced developers.

item.title: Mastering Consistency in Your Web Development Learning Journey - A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Discover how to maintain consistency in your web development learning journey with our comprehensive guide. Learn strategies to set goals, build routine, engage with communities, track progress, and more.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: Angular Signals - Taking Reactivity to New Heights ðŸš€
item.description: Discover the power of Angular Signals in our latest blog post, where we explore Settable Signals, Computed Signals, Effects, and Dynamic Dependency Tracking. Learn how these superheroes of reactive programming can boost your app's performance, scalability, and code cleanliness. Master Angular Signals today and unlock a world of efficient, flexible, and reactive programming possibilities for your applications.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: CSS Box Model - Understanding the Fundamentals
item.description: This article discusses the CSS Box Model, a fundamental concept in web development that determines the layout of web pages. It explains the four components of the Box Model and how they affect the dimensions of elements on a web page. By understanding this concept, web developers can create effective and aesthetically pleasing designs.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: 10 CRITICAL MISTAKES every Software Engineer should avoid

item.title: How to Add Comments To Your GatsbyJS Blog In Less Than 10 Minutes
item.description: Learn how to add comments to your GatsbyJS Blog in less than 10 minutes using utterances. We'll create a new gatsbyjs blog and will add the capability to add comments to it.

item.title: Mentoring at the first Tech Karo Meetup in 2021

item.title: Flutter Marketplace app with Stripe Connect - Part 2
item.description: In this series of blog posts, you'll learn how to configure Payments using Stripe Connect for a marketplace app built with Flutter. Specifically in Part 2, we're going to implement Deep Links into the Flutter app, and will use Stripe Checkout for paying for products, as customers.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: Flutter Marketplace app with Stripe Connect - Part 1
item.description: In this series of blog posts, you'll learn how to configure Payments using Stripe Connect for a marketplace app built with Flutter. Specifically in Part 1, we're going to cover Stripe configuration and Seller Registration
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: Angular Unit Tests with Jest - This constructor is not compatible with Angular Dependency Injection
item.description: In this article, you'll fix the error "This constructor is not compatible with Angular Dependency Injection" when working with Jest for unit tests.
